content: my gorgeous elise infinity scarf is the perfect stashbuster project it uses one skein of lion brand scarfie yarn which is super soft and cozy this is my december contribution to the 2019 scarf of the month club > this pattern is available for free on my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 312 yds of category 5 bulky yarn i used lion brand scarfie in the pink/silver colorway * size k 6 5 mm crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
